    • provide

      @Nonnull public INetworkItem provide(INetworkItemManager handler, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, PlayerSlot slot)
      Description copied from interface: INetworkItemProvider
      Creates a network item for the given item stack.
      Parameters:
      handler - the network item handler
      player - the player
      stack - the stack
      slot - the slot in the players inventory or curio slot, otherwise -1
      Returns:
      the network item
